text: Hi!
Hello is your line slow as well
Yes very. Not sure why.
I thought that maybe whomever was on the other side was writing a book
No. No novels from me, sorry.
Okay, but if you were what would you write about?
Probably science fiction or monsters. They seem to pair well.
Yes, that and maybe the monster was an AI intent on doing stuff to humans
I saw the news where AI in Japan said its goal was to kill humans. Like, thats not a red flag?
It may be coming, I'm not ready to serve the new overlords yet

We're doing a good job of killing ourselves off as it is.  millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
Yes, I don't think we need any help there. We're not hearing aws much about Syria these days, it's still very bad though
Yes. There are charities who are taking donations for war torn countries and their innocent children.  URL
Does it rewally help? is the aid getting through?

Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.  No government means something must be getting done efficiently
I think it's going to take action from ordinary people to get anything done, sorry for the typos my cat was in my face and the wife was needing to talk
I have 2 cats that like to help type
It's very hard to get anything done with their help
Very.  Do you donate to charities?
No, I deon't have enough money for charity, I used to try ,but they spent more to get from me than what I gave, so no I just don't

It always amuses me when I get address labels or change in the mail. "How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
